Name: Forever Slave
rawData:
Forever Slave is a Spanish gothic metal band, founded by Servalath (Sergio) and vocalist Lady Angellyca in 2000.
They recorded two demos, "Hate" and "Schwarzer Engel", in 2000 and 2001 respectively, returning with another demo in 2004, "Resurrection".
In September 2005 they released their first full-length album, Alice's Inferno, produced by Lars Ratz and released by Armageddon Music. The group released a second album, Tales for Bad Girls, in April 2008. They are currently working on a follow up

Labels: Wacken Records, SPV GmbH, Armageddon Music
